name: Demon Die's Daring Departure
description:
You were just a young die. You fell for their scam. You only saw the money they offered. Now, it's time to leave.

But well, uh, the other demons aren't very fond of that idea.

Most of the staff are just weak demons, so they won't be too much of a problem. The manager, however, is, uh, not so weak.

As a demon die, your powers are connected to your faces. Roll strategically in order to use these powers properly. These powers will help you puzzle, and even fight, your way out of the casino. Maybe you can even snag some cash along the way! If you stay alive. that is.

(Also, the R and backspace keys are forced restarts)
